engChrName: We haven't yet found records of the dirt Giacomo had on people among his belongings, so those are still out there somewhere.
engSearchText:
We haven't yet found records of the dirt Giacomo
had on people among his belongings, so those are still
out there somewhere.
jpnChrName: ジャコモの遺留品から見つからなかった以上、 未だに“ネタ”は複数隠されているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモの遺留品から見つからなかった以上、
未だに“ネタ”は複数隠されているはずだ。

engChrName: I would rather that code have not ended up in your hands in the first place, but I appreciate your cooperation all the same.
engSearchText:
I would rather that code have not ended up in your
hands in the first place, but I appreciate your
cooperation all the same.
jpnChrName: 結果的に、あの暗号をお前達に 知られてしまったのは癪だが……
jpnSearchText:
結果的に、あの暗号をお前達に
知られてしまったのは癪だが……

engChrName: I hope you continue to be this cooperative with us in the future—and we don't end up having to put you behind bars.
engSearchText:
I hope you continue to be this cooperative with us in
the future—and we don't end up having to put you
behind bars.
jpnChrName: 捜査協力に感謝するぞ。 引き続き協力的である事を祈らせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
捜査協力に感謝するぞ。
引き続き協力的である事を祈らせてもらおう。

engChrName: You called yourselves 'Arkride Solutions,' if I recall?
engSearchText: You called yourselves 'Arkride Solutions,' if I recall?
jpnChrName: お前たちは確か《アークライド解決事務所》 とか言ったな。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちは確か《アークライド解決事務所》
とか言ったな。

engChrName: I swear, you couldn't be more suspicious if you tried...
engSearchText: I swear, you couldn't be more suspicious if you tried...
jpnChrName: 先日の一件といい、 胡散臭い事この上ないが……
jpnSearchText:
先日の一件といい、
胡散臭い事この上ないが……

engChrName: ...but if you insist that you're worthy of even a fragment of our trust, go ahead and prove it.
engSearchText:
...but if you insist that you're worthy of even a
fragment of our trust, go ahead and prove it.
jpnChrName: 自信に足るだけの腕があるか 見せてもらおうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
自信に足るだけの腕があるか
見せてもらおうじゃないか。

engChrName: I had no idea this was what it looked like under the city...
engSearchText:
I had no idea this was what it looked like under
the city...
jpnChrName: 地下鉄の内部空間…… こんな風になっているんですね。
jpnSearchText:
地下鉄の内部空間……
こんな風になっているんですね。

engChrName: It feels almost surreal to be here.
engSearchText: It feels almost surreal to be here.
jpnChrName: ちょっと新鮮です。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと新鮮です。

engChrName: Don't think most people have any reason to come, so yeah.
engSearchText:
Don't think most people have any reason to come,
so yeah.
jpnChrName: ま、普通に暮らしてる分には 縁がない場所だろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、普通に暮らしてる分には
縁がない場所だろうからな。

engChrName: Looks like I'm gonna have to take back what I said, though.
engSearchText:
Looks like I'm gonna have to take back what I
said, though.
jpnChrName: ──それより、前言撤回だ。
jpnSearchText: ──それより、前言撤回だ。

engChrName: Go hang around the stalls outside or something while I take care of things in here.
engSearchText:
Go hang around the stalls outside or something while
I take care of things in here.
jpnChrName: あんたは引き返して、 屋台かなんかで時間を潰してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたは引き返して、
屋台かなんかで時間を潰してくれ。

engChrName: Why?
engSearchText: Why?

engChrName: There's why. You can find monsters even in the city—just gotta look under it.
engSearchText:
There's why. You can find monsters even in the
city—just gotta look under it.
jpnChrName: いわゆる魔獣だな。 首都でも地下エリアには棲息している。
jpnSearchText:
いわゆる魔獣だな。
首都でも地下エリアには棲息している。

engChrName: Though last I heard, the guild would periodically come and do some spring cleaning...
engSearchText:
Though last I heard, the guild would periodically
come and do some spring cleaning...
jpnChrName: このあたりはギルドの連中が 定期的に掃討していた筈だが……
jpnSearchText:
このあたりはギルドの連中が
定期的に掃討していた筈だが……

engChrName: Just saying, this is no place for a student. Leave this part to me.
engSearchText:
Just saying, this is no place for a student. Leave this
part to me.
jpnChrName: お嬢さんをエスコートできる場所じゃねえ。 俺だけでオッサンの尻尾を掴んでくるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんをエスコートできる場所じゃねえ。
俺だけでオッサンの尻尾を掴んでくるぜ。

engChrName: Don't say that...
engSearchText: Don't say that...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: I knew this job wasn't going to be without danger from the start, so I came prepared for it.
engSearchText:
I knew this job wasn't going to be without danger
from the start, so I came prepared for it.
jpnChrName: ……この依頼をお願いするにあたって 私もそれなりに覚悟してきました。
jpnSearchText:
……この依頼をお願いするにあたって
私もそれなりに覚悟してきました。

engChrName: So please, won't you take me with you? I won't get in your way. I promise.
engSearchText:
So please, won't you take me with you? I won't get in
your way. I promise.
jpnChrName: 足手まといにならないよう努力しますから 連れて行っていただけないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
足手まといにならないよう努力しますから
連れて行っていただけないでしょうか？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: はあ……？
jpnSearchText: はあ……？

engChrName: You do know we're not going on a picnic, right?
engSearchText: You do know we're not going on a picnic, right?
jpnChrName: おいおい、ピクニックに 行くってわけじゃねえんだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、ピクニックに
行くってわけじゃねえんだぞ？

engChrName: I know you got a Xipha, but you're gonna need more than that in a fight.
engSearchText:
I know you got a Xipha, but you're gonna need more
than that in a fight.
jpnChrName: いくら最新式（ザイファ）が使えたところで 魔獣相手の切った張ったまでは──
jpnSearchText:
いくら最新式（ザイファ）が使えたところで
魔獣相手の切った張ったまでは──

engChrName: I didn't come with just a combat orbment. I have this, too.
engSearchText:
I didn't come with just a combat orbment. I have
this, too.
jpnChrName: 戦術導力器（オーブメント）だけじゃありません。 ……一応、こちらも持ってきました。
jpnSearchText:
戦術導力器（オーブメント）だけじゃありません。
……一応、こちらも持ってきました。

engChrName: Whoa.
engSearchText: Whoa.
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: It's the orbal staff I chose to learn for self-defense lessons through the academy.
engSearchText:
It's the orbal staff I chose to learn for self-defense
lessons through the academy.
jpnChrName: 学校の選択科目で履修している 護身術用の導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）です。
jpnSearchText:
学校の選択科目で履修している
護身術用の導力杖（オーバルスタッフ）です。

engChrName: I have experience fighting mock battles with it and using healing arts. I really do think I can do more good than harm.
engSearchText:
I have experience fighting mock battles with it and
using healing arts. I really do think I can do more
good than harm.
jpnChrName: 模擬戦の経験もありますし、回復術も使えるので 最低限のお手伝いはさせてください。
jpnSearchText:
模擬戦の経験もありますし、回復術も使えるので
最低限のお手伝いはさせてください。

engChrName: Mmgh...
engSearchText: Mmgh...

engChrName: Fine. We're short on time, so let's just get movin'.
engSearchText: Fine. We're short on time, so let's just get movin'.
jpnChrName: まあいい、時間が惜しい。 とっとと行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、時間が惜しい。
とっとと行くぞ。

engChrName: But if I think you ARE leanin' on harm, you agree to get out of here. We clear?
engSearchText:
But if I think you ARE leanin' on harm, you agree to
get out of here. We clear?
jpnChrName: ただし足手まといと判断したら 即座に引き返してもらう。
jpnSearchText:
ただし足手まといと判断したら
即座に引き返してもらう。

engChrName: It's my job to make sure my client's safe, and I don't skimp on quality.
engSearchText:
It's my job to make sure my client's safe, and I don't
skimp on quality.
jpnChrName: 依頼人（クライアント）の安全確保のためだ。 それでいいな？
jpnSearchText:
依頼人（クライアント）の安全確保のためだ。
それでいいな？

engChrName: I understand! Thank you!
engSearchText: I understand! Thank you!
jpnChrName: ……はいっ！ どうかよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
……はいっ！
どうかよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: Do you think these are Giacomo's footprints?
engSearchText: Do you think these are Giacomo's footprints?
jpnChrName: これ…… あのジャコモさんの足跡ですか？
jpnSearchText:
これ……
あのジャコモさんの足跡ですか？

engChrName: Yeah. Fresh as a few minutes ago, I'd wager.
engSearchText: Yeah. Fresh as a few minutes ago, I'd wager.
jpnChrName: ああ、付いたばかりのもんだ。 数分前に通り過ぎたんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、付いたばかりのもんだ。
数分前に通り過ぎたんだろう。

engChrName: Which doesn't make sense.
engSearchText: Which doesn't make sense.
jpnChrName: だとすると──妙だな。
jpnSearchText: だとすると──妙だな。

engChrName: ...No. No, it doesn't.
engSearchText: ...No. No, it doesn't.
jpnChrName: あ……そういえば。
jpnSearchText: あ……そういえば。

engChrName: With all the monsters we've encountered along the way, he must have encountered some, too.
engSearchText:
With all the monsters we've encountered along the
way, he must have encountered some, too.
jpnChrName: それなりに魔獣もいましたし、 簡単には通れなさそうですよね。
jpnSearchText:
それなりに魔獣もいましたし、
簡単には通れなさそうですよね。

engChrName: Yeah. I didn't hear any gunshots either, so he had to've slipped past them all unnoticed.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I didn't hear any gunshots either, so he had
to've slipped past them all unnoticed.
jpnChrName: ああ、銃声なんかも聞こえないし 完全に躱しながら進んでやがる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、銃声なんかも聞こえないし
完全に躱しながら進んでやがる。

engChrName: And there's only one way he could've done that.
engSearchText: And there's only one way he could've done that.
jpnChrName: 考えられるとしたら………
jpnSearchText: 考えられるとしたら………

engChrName: What's that?
engSearchText: What's that?
jpnChrName: ……？ 何か心当たりでも？
jpnSearchText:
……？
何か心当たりでも？

engChrName: Don't worry about it. Just somethin' I learned about in the past.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. Just somethin' I learned about
in the past.
jpnChrName: いや、裏技めいたネタが一つな。
jpnSearchText: いや、裏技めいたネタが一つな。

engChrName: Anyway, we're almost at his hideout. Stay on guard.
engSearchText: Anyway, we're almost at his hideout. Stay on guard.
jpnChrName: どのみちそろそろ野郎のヤサだ。 慎重に進むぞ。
jpnSearchText:
どのみちそろそろ野郎のヤサだ。
慎重に進むぞ。

engChrName: Will do!
engSearchText: Will do!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Meanwhile...
engSearchText: Meanwhile...
jpnChrName: その頃──
jpnSearchText: その頃──

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: ふううっ……
jpnSearchText: ふううっ……

engChrName: This thing's good shit, but it wears you out like nothin' else.
engSearchText:
This thing's good shit, but it wears you out like
nothin' else.
jpnChrName: ったく、便利なのはいいが 疲れやすいのが難点だな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、便利なのはいいが
疲れやすいのが難点だな。

engChrName: Real big upgrade between the fourth and fifth-gen orbments right here. I can see why the army liked it so much.
engSearchText:
Real big upgrade between the fourth and fifth-gen
orbments right here. I can see why the army liked it
so much.
jpnChrName: まあ腐っても第五世代…… 軍の虎の子だっただけはある。
jpnSearchText:
まあ腐っても第五世代……
軍の虎の子だっただけはある。

engChrName: Was worth extorting it out of that corrupt general a while back.
engSearchText:
Was worth extorting it out of that corrupt general a
while back.
jpnChrName: 汚職将校から強請りネタと引き換えに 巻き上げといてよかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
汚職将校から強請りネタと引き換えに
巻き上げといてよかったぜ。

engChrName: Hmm... But what am I gonna do now?
engSearchText: Hmm... But what am I gonna do now?
jpnChrName: さてと──これからどうするか。
jpnSearchText: さてと──これからどうするか。

engChrName: No one's gonna find the goods now that I've got 'em well hidden.
engSearchText:
No one's gonna find the goods now that I've got 'em
well hidden.
jpnChrName: ブツはあそこに隠しておけば そうそうは見つからねぇ筈だ……
jpnSearchText:
ブツはあそこに隠しておけば
そうそうは見つからねぇ筈だ……

engChrName: Now I gotta settle between sellin' it to A for a fat stack or takin' it to some lab or a tech corp.
engSearchText:
Now I gotta settle between sellin' it to A for a fat
stack or takin' it to some lab or a tech corp.
jpnChrName: 何とか《Ａ》に高値で売りつけるか、 どこぞの研究所やメーカーに持ち込むか。
jpnSearchText:
何とか《Ａ》に高値で売りつけるか、
どこぞの研究所やメーカーに持ち込むか。

engChrName: That girl with Arkride seemed to know what it was worth, too...
engSearchText:
That girl with Arkride seemed to know what it was
worth, too...
jpnChrName: アークライドが連れてたあの小娘…… ブツの真価を知ってそうだったな。
jpnSearchText:
アークライドが連れてたあの小娘……
ブツの真価を知ってそうだったな。

engChrName: Heh. Wouldn't mind having her work under me if it meant gettin' him out of the way.
engSearchText:
Heh. Wouldn't mind having her work under me if it
meant gettin' him out of the way.
jpnChrName: ククッ、コマしがいがありそうだし、 何とかヤツを出し抜いてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ククッ、コマしがいがありそうだし、
何とかヤツを出し抜いてみるか。

engChrName: I might be able to tap more than extra mira out of that dea—
engSearchText:
I might be able to tap more than extra mira out of
that dea—
jpnChrName: 上手く行きゃあミラだけじゃなくて 色々と愉しませてもらえそう──
jpnSearchText:
上手く行きゃあミラだけじゃなくて
色々と愉しませてもらえそう──

engChrName: Getting a little ahead of yourself, aren't we?
engSearchText: Getting a little ahead of yourself, aren't we?
jpnChrName: 取らぬ狸の何とやら、だな。
jpnSearchText: 取らぬ狸の何とやら、だな。
！？

engChrName: Wh-What are YOU doing here?!
engSearchText: Wh-What are YOU doing here?!
jpnChrName: ア、アンタらは……！？ ………どうしてここに………
jpnSearchText:
ア、アンタらは……！？
………どうしてここに………

engChrName: So you came here after all.
engSearchText: So you came here after all.
jpnChrName: そう反応するという事は やはり“あの場所”にいたわけか。
jpnSearchText:
そう反応するという事は
やはり“あの場所”にいたわけか。

engChrName: Not a bad hustle you've got going on.
engSearchText: Not a bad hustle you've got going on.
jpnChrName: 半グレどもの動きを掴んだ上で 警察に情報を流して漁夫の利か……
jpnSearchText:
半グレどもの動きを掴んだ上で
警察に情報を流して漁夫の利か……

engChrName: You learned what those punks were up to, tipped off the cops, then snatched the case in the confusion so you could profit from the shadows.
engSearchText:
You learned what those punks were up to, tipped off
the cops, then snatched the case in the confusion so
you could profit from the shadows.
jpnChrName: なかなか優秀な情報屋じゃないか？
jpnSearchText: なかなか優秀な情報屋じゃないか？

engChrName: W-Wait! I-I hear you. I screwed up!
engSearchText: W-Wait! I-I hear you. I screwed up!
jpnChrName: ま、待て……オレが悪かった！
jpnSearchText: ま、待て……オレが悪かった！

engChrName: I'll give you back what I stole. And mira! And whatever dirt you wanna know!
engSearchText:
I'll give you back what I stole. And mira!
And whatever dirt you wanna know!
jpnChrName: 盗んだブツはちゃんと返す！ ミラや情報なんかもサービスする！
jpnSearchText:
盗んだブツはちゃんと返す！
ミラや情報なんかもサービスする！

engChrName: I-I'd never even think of pickin' a fight with Alm—
engSearchText: I-I'd never even think of pickin' a fight with Alm—
jpnChrName: め、女神に誓ってアンタら 《Ａ》に楯突くつもりなんて──
jpnSearchText:
め、女神に誓ってアンタら
《Ａ》に楯突くつもりなんて──

engChrName: Too late.
engSearchText: Too late.
jpnChrName: もう遅い。
jpnSearchText: もう遅い。

engChrName: You underestimated us, and for that, you will pay... with fear.
engSearchText:
You underestimated us, and for that, you will pay...
with fear.
jpnChrName: 我らを甘く見たこと── “恐怖”をもって贖うがいい。
jpnSearchText:
我らを甘く見たこと──
“恐怖”をもって贖うがいい。

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!
jpnChrName: ひいいいっ……！
jpnSearchText: ひいいいっ……！

engChrName: AAAAAAHH!
engSearchText: AAAAAAHH!
jpnChrName: ヒアアアアアアッ……！！
jpnSearchText: ヒアアアアアアッ……！！
……！？

engChrName: Wh-What was that?
engSearchText: Wh-What was that?
jpnChrName: い、今のは……！？
jpnSearchText: い、今のは……！？

engChrName: Giacomo!
engSearchText: Giacomo!
jpnChrName: ジャコモの声だ！
jpnSearchText: ジャコモの声だ！

engChrName: C'mon—but stay behind me!
engSearchText: C'mon—but stay behind me!
jpnChrName: 付いてこい── ただし背中から離れんな！
jpnSearchText:
付いてこい──
ただし背中から離れんな！

engChrName: O-Okay!
engSearchText: O-Okay!
jpnChrName: っ……はいっ！
jpnSearchText: っ……はいっ！
っ……

engChrName: No!
engSearchText: No!
jpnSearchText: ！　ああっ……！？
……っ！？

engChrName: Van! We've got to... He's...!
engSearchText: Van! We've got to... He's...!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！ ジャコモさんが……手当しないとっ！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……！
ジャコモさんが……手当しないとっ！

engChrName: Save it. He's dead.
engSearchText: Save it. He's dead.
jpnChrName: 手遅れだ、もう事切れてる。
jpnSearchText: 手遅れだ、もう事切れてる。

engChrName: I can't believe it...
engSearchText: I can't believe it...
jpnSearchText:
っ……
……そんな………

engChrName: (I can see he tried to resist, but he couldn't stop his throat from being slit.)
engSearchText:
(I can see he tried to resist, but he couldn't stop his
throat from being slit.)
jpnChrName: （抵抗しようとした姿勢……   問答無用で喉を掻き切られたか。）
jpnSearchText:
（抵抗しようとした姿勢……
問答無用で喉を掻き切られたか。）

engChrName: (Wasn't even the usual knife—more like a machete— and then his left hand is...)
engSearchText:
(Wasn't even the usual knife—more like a machete—
and then his left hand is...)
jpnChrName: （得物はナイフ……いや山刀（マチェット）か。   それにこの左手の指の形は──）
jpnSearchText:
（得物はナイフ……いや山刀（マチェット）か。
それにこの左手の指の形は──）

engChrName: What are you two doing down here?!
engSearchText: What are you two doing down here?!
jpnChrName: お前たち、何をしている！？
jpnSearchText: お前たち、何をしている！？

engChrName: Wh-What in Aidios' name...?
engSearchText: Wh-What in Aidios' name...?
jpnChrName: こ、これは……
jpnSearchText: こ、これは……

engChrName: Whoa! Look at all that blood!
engSearchText: Whoa! Look at all that blood!
jpnChrName: うわわっ、血ぃッ！？
jpnSearchText: うわわっ、血ぃッ！？
……………………………

engChrName: Shit.
engSearchText: Shit.
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: It would be the guy we were just about to ask to come in and talk to us.
engSearchText:
It would be the guy we were just about to ask to come
in and talk to us.
jpnChrName: ……情報屋ジャコモ…… 任意聴取をしようとした矢先にか。
jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: I'm so glad we made it in time!
jpnChrName: よかった、間に合いましたっ。

Though I'm sure you would be fine without our aid,
we're here to lend it all the same!

jpnSearchText:
無用かと存じますが
加勢に参上しました……！

I suspected you would show up about now, but I
didn't think it would be with the Divine Blade
of Silver.
jpnChrName: フッ、そろそろ来ると思ったが まさか白銀の剣聖が一緒とは。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、そろそろ来ると思ったが
まさか白銀の剣聖が一緒とは。

engChrName: Well, here I am.
engSearchText: Well, here I am.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、お邪魔しているよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、お邪魔しているよ。

engSearchText:
I suspected you would show up about now, but I
didn't think you would have the guild's rising
star with you.
jpnChrName: フッ、そろそろ来ると思ったが ギルドの若手エースが一緒とは。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、そろそろ来ると思ったが
ギルドの若手エースが一緒とは。

engChrName: Good to see you again.
engSearchText: Good to see you again.
jpnChrName: ん、打ち上げぶりだね。
jpnSearchText: ん、打ち上げぶりだね。

engChrName: I suspected you would show up about now, but I didn't think you would have someone from Heiyue with you.
engSearchText:
I suspected you would show up about now, but I
didn't think you would have someone from Heiyue
with you.
jpnChrName: フッ、そろそろ来ると思ったが まさか黒月幹部が一緒とは。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、そろそろ来ると思ったが
まさか黒月幹部が一緒とは。

engChrName: Oh, we have many a debt to repay to you, after all.
engSearchText: Oh, we have many a debt to repay to you, after all.
jpnChrName: フフ、その節はどうも。
jpnSearchText: フフ、その節はどうも。

engChrName: Well, I could've taken out these things just fine without you guys...
engSearchText:
Well, I could've taken out these things just fine
without you guys...
jpnChrName: ハッ、てめえらの助力なんざ あっても無くても同じことだが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、てめえらの助力なんざ
あっても無くても同じことだが……

engChrName: ...but I'm gonna hurl if I see them for another minute, so let's just get this over with!
engSearchText:
...but I'm gonna hurl if I see them for another minute,
so let's just get this over with!
jpnChrName: このクソ球に粘られてもダリぃだけだ！ 秒で片付けんぞ！
jpnSearchText:
このクソ球に粘られてもダリぃだけだ！
秒で片付けんぞ！

engChrName: Heh. A simple 'thanks' would do the job just fine!
engSearchText: Heh. A simple 'thanks' would do the job just fine!
jpnChrName: ヘッ、口が減らねえ小僧だ！
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、口が減らねえ小僧だ！

engChrName: Forward, everyone! Let's make this quick!
engSearchText: Forward, everyone! Let's make this quick!
jpnChrName: 一気に制圧する──行くぞ！
jpnSearchText: 一気に制圧する──行くぞ！

engChrName: Whew... That takes care of that.
engSearchText: Whew... That takes care of that.
jpnChrName: ふう……こんなもんか。
jpnSearchText: ふう……こんなもんか。

engChrName: Looks like we've severed the connection between the sphere and the devils, too.
engSearchText:
Looks like we've severed the connection between the
sphere and the devils, too.
jpnChrName: 魔球からの“力”も 断ち切れたみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
魔球からの“力”も
断ち切れたみたいだね。

engChrName: Looks like we've severed the connection between the sphere and the devils.
engSearchText:
Looks like we've severed the connection between the
sphere and the devils.
jpnChrName: 魔球からの“力”も 何とか断てたみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
魔球からの“力”も
何とか断てたみたいだね。

engChrName: That sphere will supply power no longer.
engSearchText: That sphere will supply power no longer.
jpnChrName: 魔球からの“力”も 無事、祓えたようですね。
jpnSearchText:
魔球からの“力”も
無事、祓えたようですね。

engChrName: Hmm... It's almost as if they're sub-devices to whatever is causing this event.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It's almost as if they're sub-devices to
whatever is causing this event.
jpnChrName: ふむ、どうやら今回の“元凶”の サブ端末のようなものか……？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、どうやら今回の“元凶”の
サブ端末のようなものか……？

engChrName: ...You might be right on the money with that comparison.
engSearchText:
...You might be right on the money with
that comparison.
jpnChrName: ……その喩えはあながち 間違っちゃいなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
……その喩えはあながち
間違っちゃいなさそうだな。
……？

engChrName: Well, looks like that was a close call, but I'm glad we managed to turn it around.
engSearchText:
Well, looks like that was a close call, but I'm glad we
managed to turn it around.
jpnChrName: ──ま、危うかったが 何とか立て直せたじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
──ま、危うかったが
何とか立て直せたじゃねえか？

engChrName: As your chief, I'll give you a pat on the back this time.
engSearchText: As your chief, I'll give you a pat on the back this time.
jpnChrName: 解決事務所の所長として 一応、及第点はくれてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所の所長として
一応、及第点はくれてやるよ。

engChrName: *pant* Oh, screw you. Saying that kinda crap is why I call you old.
engSearchText:
*pant* Oh, screw you. Saying that kinda crap is why I
call you old.
jpnChrName: はあはあ……ウゼエ。 そういう所がオヤジくせえんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……ウゼエ。
そういう所がオヤジくせえんだよ。

engChrName: Wh-What's so old about that?
engSearchText: Wh-What's so old about that?
jpnChrName: な、なにぃ？
jpnSearchText: な、なにぃ？

engChrName: Anyway, after that creepy-ass call and all that's happened since, we know what we've gotta be doing.
engSearchText:
Anyway, after that creepy-ass call and all that's
happened since, we know what we've gotta be doing.
jpnChrName: クソッタレな通信にこの異変、 やるべき事は見えてんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
クソッタレな通信にこの異変、
やるべき事は見えてんだろ。

engChrName: So quit it with the big talk and just be happy you've got me on the team again.
engSearchText:
So quit it with the big talk and just be happy you've
got me on the team again.
jpnChrName: 前置きとかはいいから 俺と合流できたのを素直に喜べや。
jpnSearchText:
前置きとかはいいから
俺と合流できたのを素直に喜べや。

engChrName: 'Cause I've got the strength of a hundred decrepit farts like you.
engSearchText:
'Cause I've got the strength of a hundred decrepit
farts like you.
jpnChrName: くたびれたオッサンに 百人力を貸してやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
くたびれたオッサンに
百人力を貸してやるからよ。

engChrName: You little punk...
engSearchText: You little punk...
jpnChrName: こ、このガキは……
jpnSearchText: こ、このガキは……

engChrName: Ahaha... Things just aren't the same without the Aaron we know and love.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Things just aren't the same without the
Aaron we know and love.
jpnChrName: あはは……でも アーロンさんらしいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……でも
アーロンさんらしいですっ。

engChrName: He is correct that our next course of action is clear, however.
engSearchText:
He is correct that our next course of action is
clear, however.
jpnChrName: 確かにやるべきことは明白、ですか。
jpnSearchText: 確かにやるべきことは明白、ですか。

engChrName: (Heh. How he's grown.)
engSearchText: (Heh. How he's grown.)
jpnChrName: （フフ……   どうやら一皮剥けたようですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（フフ……
どうやら一皮剥けたようですね。）

engChrName: All right, then, let's get back to the café and bar for now.
engSearchText:
All right, then, let's get back to the café and bar
for now.
jpnChrName: フッ……とりあえず いったんカフェバーに戻るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……とりあえず
いったんカフェバーに戻るぞ。

engChrName: Giacomo...died here.
engSearchText: Giacomo...died here.
jpnChrName: ……ジャコモさんが亡くなった……
jpnSearchText: ……ジャコモさんが亡くなった……

engChrName: I guess the cops are all done with their investigation. Even the blood's gone.
engSearchText:
I guess the cops are all done with their investigation.
Even the blood's gone.
jpnChrName: 警察の捜査も終わったみたいだな。 血痕も綺麗サッパリ片付いてやがる。
jpnSearchText:
警察の捜査も終わったみたいだな。
血痕も綺麗サッパリ片付いてやがる。

engChrName: I don't recall seeing anything regarding this incident in the news, now that I think about it.
engSearchText:
I don't recall seeing anything regarding this incident
in the news, now that I think about it.
jpnChrName: 結局、あの事件はニュースでも 大きくは取り上げられませんでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
結局、あの事件はニュースでも
大きくは取り上げられませんでしたね。

engChrName: I mean, the perp was caught. With A involved, that's probably as far as anyone's willing to go.
engSearchText:
I mean, the perp was caught. With A involved, that's
probably as far as anyone's willing to go.
jpnChrName: 犯人は捕まったが、《Ａ》関連だしな。
jpnSearchText: 犯人は捕まったが、《Ａ》関連だしな。

engChrName: People will forget eventually—even the ones that cared. This isn't the sorta case you tie up with a neat little bow.
engSearchText:
People will forget eventually—even the ones
that cared. This isn't the sorta case you tie up with a
neat little bow.
jpnChrName: このままうやむやになって 誰からも忘れられていくんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
このままうやむやになって
誰からも忘れられていくんだろう。

engChrName: That's...sad.
engSearchText: That's...sad.
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: Look, no one forced him to go stick his nose in A's business. He got greedy, and this is the result.
engSearchText:
Look, no one forced him to go stick his nose
in A's business. He got greedy, and this is the
result.
jpnChrName: ま、あのオッサンも欲をかいて 《Ａ》関連に足を踏み入れたのが運のツキってな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あのオッサンも欲をかいて
《Ａ》関連に足を踏み入れたのが運のツキってな。

engChrName: Considerin' all the crap he's always been up to, I'd say he got what was comin'. You gotta grow a thicker skin, or you ain't survivin' this job.
engSearchText:
Considerin' all the crap he's always been up to, I'd say
he got what was comin'. You gotta grow a thicker
skin, or you ain't survivin' this job.
jpnChrName: 今までやってきたことを考えりゃ因果応報── 一々気にし過ぎると持たねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
今までやってきたことを考えりゃ因果応報──
一々気にし過ぎると持たねえぞ。

engChrName: Though...I guess it's just as good to not be jaded.
engSearchText: Though...I guess it's just as good to not be jaded.
jpnChrName: ……ま、スレてねぇのはいいことだ。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、スレてねぇのはいいことだ。

engChrName: Maybe don't go growin' a thicker skin. It's best if you don't get too used to all the shit that goes on in the darker side of society.
engSearchText:
Maybe don't go growin' a thicker skin. It's best if you
don't get too used to all the shit that goes on in the
darker side of society.
jpnChrName: お前さんも助手をやるからって あんまり裏に踏み込み過ぎねぇようにな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんも助手をやるからって
あんまり裏に踏み込み過ぎねぇようにな。

jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん……）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァンさん……）

engChrName: That newbie's got some real obsession with you, y'know.
engSearchText:
That newbie's got some real obsession with
you, y'know.

jpnSearchText:
そういやあの新米記者、
お前に随分とご執心みたいだな？

engChrName: Just you wait, Dingo! I'll get one over you this time!
engSearchText: Just you wait, Dingo! I'll get one over you this time!

jpnSearchText:
見てなさいよ～、ディンゴ・ブラッド！
今度こそ出し抜いてやるんだから～！

engSearchText: What's goin' on between you two anyway?
jpnChrName: で、どんな関係なんだ？
jpnSearchText: で、どんな関係なんだ？

engChrName: You said earlier she sees you as her rival. Do you happen to know why?
engSearchText:
You said earlier she sees you as her rival. Do you
happen to know why?
jpnChrName: ライバル視されていると言いましたが、 何か理由があるんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ライバル視されていると言いましたが、
何か理由があるんでしょうか？

engChrName: Your guess is as good as mine. Maybe she just likes having a bit of friendly competition with other people in the industry.
engSearchText:
Your guess is as good as mine. Maybe she just likes
having a bit of friendly competition with other people
in the industry.
jpnChrName: どうと聞かれてもな…… ただの同業者としか答えようがない。
jpnSearchText:
どうと聞かれてもな……
ただの同業者としか答えようがない。

engChrName: Why do you ask, anyway?
engSearchText: Why do you ask, anyway?
jpnChrName: フッ、しかし君は意外と 遠慮なく踏み込んでくるタイプだな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、しかし君は意外と
遠慮なく踏み込んでくるタイプだな。

engChrName: Oh, umm, no reason. Sorry.
engSearchText: Oh, umm, no reason. Sorry.
jpnChrName: ハッ、すみません……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、すみません……

engChrName: Don't be. It's not like I have anything to hide.
engSearchText: Don't be. It's not like I have anything to hide.
jpnChrName: いや、いいさ。 隠すようなことでもない。
jpnSearchText:
いや、いいさ。
隠すようなことでもない。

engChrName: Guess I can tell you the story. This happened right after Marielle joined the Tyrell Times.
engSearchText:
Guess I can tell you the story. This happened right
after Marielle joined the Tyrell Times.

jpnSearchText:
マリエルが《タイレル通信》に
入った直後の頃……

engChrName: She'd set off on some noble crusade against a politician with a rather—let's just say—unsavory reputation.
engSearchText:
She'd set off on some noble crusade against a politician
with a rather—let's just say—unsavory reputation.
jpnChrName: 彼女は無謀にも、当時怪しい噂があった とある政治家をしつこく嗅ぎまわっていてな。
jpnSearchText:
彼女は無謀にも、当時怪しい噂があった
とある政治家をしつこく嗅ぎまわっていてな。

engChrName: And when he caught wind of what she was doing, he started threatening her.
engSearchText:
And when he caught wind of what she was doing, he
started threatening her.
jpnChrName: それを気付かれて、 色々と脅されていたそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
それを気付かれて、
色々と脅されていたそうだ。

engChrName: Ah, the righteous young journalist who ends up vanishing into the darkness she thought she could fight...
engSearchText:
Ah, the righteous young journalist who ends up
vanishing into the darkness she thought she
could fight...
jpnChrName: 正義感に燃える若いジャーナリストが いつの間にか闇に消える……
jpnSearchText:
正義感に燃える若いジャーナリストが
いつの間にか闇に消える……

engChrName: Tale as old as time. 'Course, it didn't pan out that way this time, and I'm assuming you're the reason why.
engSearchText:
Tale as old as time. 'Course, it didn't pan out
that way this time, and I'm assuming you're
the reason why.
jpnChrName: よく聞く話だが お前もその件に関わっていたのか？
jpnSearchText:
よく聞く話だが
お前もその件に関わっていたのか？

engChrName: Guilty as charged. I just so happened to have some dirt on said politician.
engSearchText:
Guilty as charged. I just so happened to have some
dirt on said politician.
jpnChrName: ああ……偶然にも俺もあの政治家のネタを いくつか握っていてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……偶然にも俺もあの政治家のネタを
いくつか握っていてな。

engChrName: It wasn't big or anything. Not really worth calling it a scoop, so I packed it up and sent it over to Marielle.
engSearchText:
It wasn't big or anything. Not really worth calling it a
scoop, so I packed it up and sent it over to Marielle.
jpnChrName: スクープにするには物足りなかったから、 あえてマリエルに流すことにした。
jpnSearchText:
スクープにするには物足りなかったから、
あえてマリエルに流すことにした。

engChrName: And she did exactly as I expected and went public with that info.
engSearchText:
And she did exactly as I expected and went public
with that info.
jpnChrName: すると彼女は予想通り、 それらを公表した。
jpnSearchText:
すると彼女は予想通り、
それらを公表した。

engChrName: What happened after that?
engSearchText: What happened after that?
jpnChrName: それで、どうなりましたか？
jpnSearchText: それで、どうなりましたか？

engChrName: Long story short: nothing.
engSearchText: Long story short: nothing.
jpnChrName: 結論から言えば、どうもなっていない。
jpnSearchText: 結論から言えば、どうもなっていない。

engChrName: Like I said, it wasn't anything major. Not the kinda dirt that'd get you a hit piece.
engSearchText:
Like I said, it wasn't anything major. Not the
kinda dirt that'd get you a hit piece.
jpnChrName: 言ったように、スクープにするには 少し足りないネタではあったからな。
jpnSearchText:
言ったように、スクープにするには
少し足りないネタではあったからな。

engChrName: Hence why most journalists wouldn't bother writing up something like that.
engSearchText:
Hence why most journalists wouldn't bother writing
up something like that.
jpnChrName: 普通ならあの程度のネタを わざわざ記事にしたりはしないんだが。
jpnSearchText:
普通ならあの程度のネタを
わざわざ記事にしたりはしないんだが。

engChrName: But Marielle isn't most journalists. That girl's as green as they come.
engSearchText:
But Marielle isn't most journalists. That girl's
as green as they come.
jpnChrName: それも未熟な新人故の行動ってわけか。
jpnSearchText: それも未熟な新人故の行動ってわけか。

engChrName: True. But that politician didn't realize that.
engSearchText: True. But that politician didn't realize that.
jpnChrName: ああ、だが相手の政治家は そう思わなかったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だが相手の政治家は
そう思わなかったようだ。

engChrName: He convinced himself that Marielle must have some real dirt on him, or she never would've gone public with something so insignificant.
engSearchText:
He convinced himself that Marielle must have some
real dirt on him, or she never would've gone public
with something so insignificant.
jpnChrName: マリエルにもっと大きなネタを 握られていると勝手に思い込み──
jpnSearchText:
マリエルにもっと大きなネタを
握られていると勝手に思い込み──

engChrName: He took it as her trying to propose a truce.
engSearchText: He took it as her trying to propose a truce.
jpnChrName: 『このくらいで互いに手打ちにしよう』という 彼女の意思表示だと勘違いした。
jpnSearchText:
『このくらいで互いに手打ちにしよう』という
彼女の意思表示だと勘違いした。

engChrName: After that, he stopped messing with her.
engSearchText: After that, he stopped messing with her.
jpnChrName: それ以降、彼女に手を出すことはなかった。
jpnSearchText: それ以降、彼女に手を出すことはなかった。

engChrName: So, when you sent her that information, was that the outcome you were hoping for?
engSearchText:
So, when you sent her that information, was that
the outcome you were hoping for?
jpnChrName: まさかディンゴさんは そこまで読んで情報を流して……？
jpnSearchText:
まさかディンゴさんは
そこまで読んで情報を流して……？

engChrName: That's right. Though, admittedly, I never thought it'd turn out as well as it did.
engSearchText:
That's right. Though, admittedly, I never thought
it'd turn out as well as it did.
jpnChrName: 狙っていなかったわけじゃないが、 上手く行ったのはたまたまだな。
jpnSearchText:
狙っていなかったわけじゃないが、
上手く行ったのはたまたまだな。

engChrName: For whatever reason, Lady Luck's taken a real shine to that girl.
engSearchText:
For whatever reason, Lady Luck's taken a real
shine to that girl.
jpnChrName: どうも、マリエルは 異常なほどの幸運の持ち主らしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
どうも、マリエルは
異常なほどの幸運の持ち主らしくてな。

engChrName: She sticks her nose into danger over and over, and yet every time, she comes out of it without so much as a scratch.
engSearchText:
She sticks her nose into danger over and over,
and yet every time, she comes out of it without
so much as a scratch.
jpnChrName: 厄介事に首を突っ込む性格をしていながら、 最終的には大体無事に終わる──
jpnSearchText:
厄介事に首を突っ込む性格をしていながら、
最終的には大体無事に終わる──

engChrName: Guess she was just born under the right stars.
engSearchText: Guess she was just born under the right stars.
jpnChrName: そんな星の下に生まれているらしい。
jpnSearchText: そんな星の下に生まれているらしい。

engChrName: I-I see.
engSearchText: I-I see.
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか……

engChrName: Sounds like a real agent of chaos to me. I know the type; they're always makin' messes that everyone else has to mop up later.
engSearchText:
Sounds like a real agent of chaos to me. I know
the type; they're always makin' messes that
everyone else has to mop up later.
jpnChrName: 聞いてるだけでも、随分と 手を焼かされてるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
聞いてるだけでも、随分と
手を焼かされてるみたいだな？

engChrName: That's her, all right. And right now, we're the cleanup crew.
engSearchText:
That's her, all right. And right now, we're the
cleanup crew.
jpnChrName: それはともかく、現に危険な場所に 足を踏み込んでいることに違いはない。
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく、現に危険な場所に
足を踏み込んでいることに違いはない。

engChrName: So let's get to her before she goes and makes yet another mess.
engSearchText:
So let's get to her before she goes and makes yet
another mess.
jpnChrName: 先を急ごう。
jpnSearchText: 先を急ごう。

engChrName: If you think about it, Dingo, you've helped Marielle quite a lot, haven't you?
engSearchText:
If you think about it, Dingo, you've helped Marielle
quite a lot, haven't you?
jpnChrName: さっきの話ですけど、マリエルさんは ディンゴさんに助けられたのに──
jpnSearchText:
さっきの話ですけど、マリエルさんは
ディンゴさんに助けられたのに──

engChrName: Why would she consider you a rival, then?
engSearchText: Why would she consider you a rival, then?
jpnChrName: なぜそんなライバル意識を 抱くようになったのでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
なぜそんなライバル意識を
抱くようになったのでしょう？

engChrName: (If anything, you'd think she'd fancy him instead.)
engSearchText: (If anything, you'd think she'd fancy him instead.)
jpnChrName: （むしろ好意が芽生えても……）
jpnSearchText: （むしろ好意が芽生えても……）

engChrName: I mean, it wasn't always like that.
engSearchText: I mean, it wasn't always like that.
jpnChrName: 最初からああってわけじゃなかったが……
jpnSearchText: 最初からああってわけじゃなかったが……

engChrName: But after the whole deal with the politician, she became weirdly...fixated on me. She just won't leave me alone.
engSearchText:
But after the whole deal with the politician,
she became weirdly...fixated on me. She
just won't leave me alone.
jpnChrName: あの事件以来、むしろこっちが 戸惑うくらい懐かれてはいたな。
jpnSearchText:
あの事件以来、むしろこっちが
戸惑うくらい懐かれてはいたな。

engChrName: Okay, pretty boy. Rein it in with the flexing.
engSearchText: Okay, pretty boy. Rein it in with the flexing.
jpnChrName: ちっ、イケメンが……
jpnSearchText: ちっ、イケメンが……

engChrName: I had to tell her that she should probably not be so friendly with the competition.
engSearchText:
I had to tell her that she should probably not be so
friendly with the competition.
jpnChrName: 他誌の人間とそんなに親しく しない方がいいと忠告したら──
jpnSearchText:
他誌の人間とそんなに親しく
しない方がいいと忠告したら──

engChrName: That's how she found out I work for Meld, actually. It was quite a shock for her.
engSearchText:
That's how she found out I work for Meld, actually.
It was quite a shock for her.
jpnChrName: 彼女は初めて俺が《メルド》の人間だと知って、 かなりショックを受けたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女は初めて俺が《メルド》の人間だと知って、
かなりショックを受けたようだ。

engChrName: Oh.
engSearchText: Oh.

engChrName: So she realized the amazing journalist she looked up to so much works for a trashy gossip rag.
engSearchText:
So she realized the amazing journalist she looked up
to so much works for a trashy gossip rag.
jpnChrName: 憧れの業界の大先輩が、実はゴシップ誌の ルポライターってオチだからな。
jpnSearchText:
憧れの業界の大先輩が、実はゴシップ誌の
ルポライターってオチだからな。

engChrName: Look at you, breaking that righteous little heart of hers.
engSearchText:
Look at you, breaking that righteous little heart
of hers.
jpnChrName: 正義のジャーナリストを目指すひよっこには そりゃショックも大きいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
正義のジャーナリストを目指すひよっこには
そりゃショックも大きいだろ。

engChrName: Anyway, you'd think she'd just leave it at that and cut contact.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you'd think she'd just leave it at that and
cut contact.
jpnChrName: それで普通に疎遠になっていたら なんの問題もなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
それで普通に疎遠になっていたら
なんの問題もなかったが……

engChrName: Instead, she pivoted into talking about course-correction and 'making me a proper journalist.' Now she's playing my rival, too, for whatever reason.
engSearchText:
Instead, she pivoted into talking about
course-correction and 'making me a proper journalist.'
Now she's playing my rival, too, for whatever reason.
jpnChrName: 真っ当な記者として更生させるとか言って、 勝手にライバル認定されてしまってな。
jpnSearchText:
真っ当な記者として更生させるとか言って、
勝手にライバル認定されてしまってな。

engChrName: Joke's on me, because that just made her follow me around even more now.
engSearchText:
Joke's on me, because that just made her follow me
around even more now.
jpnChrName: むしろ前より付きまとうようになったわけだ。
jpnSearchText: むしろ前より付きまとうようになったわけだ。

engChrName: I see... Though for as annoyed as you look, you can't just turn a blind eye to her, either.
engSearchText:
I see... Though for as annoyed as you look, you can't
just turn a blind eye to her, either.
jpnChrName: あはは……ですがそう言いつつ ディンゴさんも放っておけないんですね？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ですがそう言いつつ
ディンゴさんも放っておけないんですね？

engChrName: You care about her enough that you would've gone in after her, even if you were alone, right?
engSearchText:
You care about her enough that you would've gone in
after her, even if you were alone, right?
jpnChrName: こうして同じく危険な場所に 一人で乗り込もうとしていたくらいには。
jpnSearchText:
こうして同じく危険な場所に
一人で乗り込もうとしていたくらいには。

engChrName: Hmph. Well, in some Goddess-forsaken way, it's my responsibility. The least I could do is keep an eye on her.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Well, in some Goddess-forsaken way, it's
my responsibility. The least I could do is keep an eye
on her.
jpnChrName: ……フッ、ある意味俺の責任でもある、 面倒くらい見るのが筋というだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
……フッ、ある意味俺の責任でもある、
面倒くらい見るのが筋というだけさ。

engChrName: I'd bet your boss here would do much the same.
engSearchText: I'd bet your boss here would do much the same.
jpnChrName: そこの男でもそうすると思うがな。
jpnSearchText: そこの男でもそうすると思うがな。

engChrName: Nah, I don't do babysitting.
engSearchText: Nah, I don't do babysitting.
jpnChrName: ハッ、自己責任だろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、自己責任だろ。

engChrName: I don't mind helpin' her this time, but that's only 'cause I'm already here for that wanted monster.
engSearchText:
I don't mind helpin' her this time, but that's only
'cause I'm already here for that wanted monster.
jpnChrName: こっちは手配魔獣を片付ける ついでってだけだしな。
jpnSearchText:
こっちは手配魔獣を片付ける
ついでってだけだしな。

engChrName: And speakin' of wanted monster, how 'bout we hurry up?
engSearchText:
And speakin' of wanted monster, how 'bout we
hurry up?
jpnChrName: そういう意味でももっと急いだ方が いいんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
そういう意味でももっと急いだ方が
いいんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Sure. We haven't found her yet, after all.
engSearchText: Sure. We haven't found her yet, after all.
jpnChrName: そ、そうですね…… いまだに見つかりませんし。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですね……
いまだに見つかりませんし。

engChrName: She must be deeper in still. Sorry for all the bother, but thanks for helping out with this.
engSearchText:
She must be deeper in still. Sorry for all the bother,
but thanks for helping out with this.
jpnChrName: だがかなり深部まで進んできたはずだ。 すまないが最後まで頼む。
jpnSearchText:
だがかなり深部まで進んできたはずだ。
すまないが最後まで頼む。

engChrName: Hmm? I heard something from the room ahead of us. There's...people inside.
engSearchText:
Hmm? I heard something from the room ahead of us.
There's...people inside.
jpnChrName: あれ、この先の部屋から音がします。 ……それに、誰かいる気配もしますね。
jpnSearchText:
あれ、この先の部屋から音がします。
……それに、誰かいる気配もしますね。

engChrName: Several people. Maybe it's...
engSearchText: Several people. Maybe it's...
jpnChrName: 相手は複数人みたいですけど……
jpnSearchText: 相手は複数人みたいですけど……

engChrName: Almata? I hope not...
engSearchText: Almata? I hope not...
jpnChrName: アルマータ…… ではないと思いたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ……
ではないと思いたいですけど……

engChrName: Nah, I doubt it. Probably just exactly who we wanna see here.
engSearchText:
Nah, I doubt it. Probably just exactly who we wanna
see here.
jpnChrName: いや、どっちかっつうと 好都合な相手かもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、どっちかっつうと
好都合な相手かもしれねえな。

engChrName: Let's head in.
engSearchText: Let's head in.
jpnChrName: 早速中に入ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 早速中に入ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Hello there, officers.
engSearchText: Hello there, officers.
jpnChrName: よう警部、先日ぶりだな。
jpnSearchText: よう警部、先日ぶりだな。

engChrName: How you likin' this spot? You come by here often. Hope you found what you're lookin' for.
engSearchText:
How you likin' this spot? You come by here often.
Hope you found what you're lookin' for.
jpnChrName: あの件から随分経ってるってのに、 こんな所で何してんだ？
jpnSearchText:
あの件から随分経ってるってのに、
こんな所で何してんだ？

engChrName: I should be asking you that question. What's a punk like you doing in here?
engSearchText:
I should be asking you that question. What's a punk
like you doing in here?
jpnChrName: 誰かと思えば……この前の若造か。 それはこちらの台詞だ。
jpnSearchText:
誰かと思えば……この前の若造か。
それはこちらの台詞だ。

engChrName: And you brought a child along this time.
engSearchText: And you brought a child along this time.
jpnChrName: しかも今度は子どもまで連れて来て……
jpnSearchText: しかも今度は子どもまで連れて来て……

engChrName: There is a police investigation underway here. Civilians are not allowed on the premises.
engSearchText:
There is a police investigation underway here.
Civilians are not allowed on the premises.
jpnChrName: ここは警察が調査中だぞ。 一般人の立ち入りは許可できん。
jpnSearchText:
ここは警察が調査中だぞ。
一般人の立ち入りは許可できん。

engChrName: Aww, come on. Don't be like that.
engSearchText: Aww, come on. Don't be like that.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、そう言うなって。
jpnSearchText: まあまあ、そう言うなって。

engChrName: I just stopped by on a job.
engSearchText: I just stopped by on a job.
jpnChrName: こっちはこっちで とある依頼を受けて立ち寄ったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
こっちはこっちで
とある依頼を受けて立ち寄ったんだが……

engChrName: Guess you guys are looking for something, too, huh?
engSearchText: Guess you guys are looking for something, too, huh?
jpnChrName: どうやら警察の方でも “探し物”をしてるみてえだな？
jpnSearchText:
どうやら警察の方でも
“探し物”をしてるみてえだな？

engChrName: If you already know, then why are you asking? It's not like I'll tell you anything else, either.
engSearchText:
If you already know, then why are you asking? It's not
like I'll tell you anything else, either.
jpnChrName: フン……知ったような口を聞く。 だが教えてやる義理は無い。
jpnSearchText:
フン……知ったような口を聞く。
だが教えてやる義理は無い。

engChrName: Why don't you just go ahead and tell me what kinda job you're taking that brought you back here, of all places.
engSearchText:
Why don't you just go ahead and tell me what kinda
job you're taking that brought you back here, of
all places.
jpnChrName: お前たちの方こそ、 どんな依頼なのか具体的に言ってみろ。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちの方こそ、
どんな依頼なのか具体的に言ってみろ。

engChrName: This doesn't have to be a questioning, though I don't mind taking you along to the station for an interview. Voluntarily, of course.
engSearchText:
This doesn't have to be a questioning, though I don't
mind taking you along to the station for an interview.
Voluntarily, of course.
jpnChrName: それとも、この場で事情聴取、 もしくは任意同行に協力願おうか？
jpnSearchText:
それとも、この場で事情聴取、
もしくは任意同行に協力願おうか？

engChrName: Hey, whoa! Hold up there. I ain't tryin' to pick a fight.
engSearchText:
Hey, whoa! Hold up there. I ain't tryin' to pick
a fight.
jpnChrName: 待て待て、 アンタらと揉めるつもりはねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
待て待て、
アンタらと揉めるつもりはねえよ。

engChrName: We got our own business around here.
engSearchText: We got our own business around here.
jpnChrName: 俺達もちょいと“探し物”があってな。
jpnSearchText: 俺達もちょいと“探し物”があってな。

engChrName: What do you say I scratch your back and help you look for whatever it is you're trying to find?
engSearchText:
What do you say I scratch your back and help you
look for whatever it is you're trying to find?
jpnChrName: 提案があるんだが──ここは試しに、 捜索を手伝わせてもらえないか？
jpnSearchText:
提案があるんだが──ここは試しに、
捜索を手伝わせてもらえないか？

engChrName: Who knows? Maybe an outsider's perspective will help things along better than you could, Inspector.
engSearchText:
Who knows? Maybe an outsider's perspective will
help things along better than you could, Inspector.
jpnChrName: 警察とは違う観点から 見つかる物があるかもしれないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
警察とは違う観点から
見つかる物があるかもしれないぜ。

engChrName: And, of course, we'll tell you about anything we find. No secrets here.
engSearchText:
And, of course, we'll tell you about anything we find.
No secrets here.
jpnChrName: 勿論、こっちの方で何か気付いた場合は 包み隠さず情報共有させてもらうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、こっちの方で何か気付いた場合は
包み隠さず情報共有させてもらうつもりだ。

engChrName: I know we're asking for a lot, but please consider making an exception this time!
engSearchText:
I know we're asking for a lot, but please consider
making an exception this time!
jpnChrName: 無理を言っているのは承知の上です。 ですがそこをなんとか……！
jpnSearchText:
無理を言っているのは承知の上です。
ですがそこをなんとか……！

engChrName: Of course! We won't get in your way, Inspector!
engSearchText: Of course! We won't get in your way, Inspector!
jpnChrName: はい、警察の皆さんの 邪魔はしませんからっ！
jpnSearchText:
はい、警察の皆さんの
邪魔はしませんからっ！

engChrName: I can even go out and clean up the waterway monsters so things are a little safer here!
engSearchText:
I can even go out and clean up the waterway monsters
so things are a little safer here!
jpnChrName: なんなら、皆さんの安全を守る為に 地下水路の魔獣を掃討してきますよっ！
jpnSearchText:
なんなら、皆さんの安全を守る為に
地下水路の魔獣を掃討してきますよっ！

engChrName: As in...you're going to fight them?
engSearchText: As in...you're going to fight them?
jpnChrName: はぁ？　なんだと……？
jpnSearchText: はぁ？　なんだと……？

engChrName: (Damn it, kid. Maybe let me handle this one.)
engSearchText: (Damn it, kid. Maybe let me handle this one.)
jpnChrName: （余計な事は言うんじゃねえ！）
jpnSearchText: （余計な事は言うんじゃねえ！）

engChrName: Ahem... Anyway, please? You can trust me a little on this one.
engSearchText:
Ahem... Anyway, please? You can trust me a little on
this one.
jpnChrName: コホン……ともかく頼む。 一時的に信用してみちゃくれないか。
jpnSearchText:
コホン……ともかく頼む。
一時的に信用してみちゃくれないか。

engChrName: If supervision would make you feel better, you can always have someone watch us.
engSearchText:
If supervision would make you feel better, you can
always have someone watch us.
jpnChrName: なんなら監視を付けてくれてもいいぜ。
jpnSearchText: なんなら監視を付けてくれてもいいぜ。

engChrName: You're shameless, thinking you can come in and just ask for me to trust you. Just like that.
engSearchText:
You're shameless, thinking you can come in and just
ask for me to trust you. Just like that.
jpnChrName: はぁ……全く。 お前たちのどこを信用しろと言うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……全く。
お前たちのどこを信用しろと言うんだ。

engChrName: ...And yet the CID trusts you—if ever so slightly.
engSearchText: ...And yet the CID trusts you—if ever so slightly.
jpnChrName: ……だが、なぜだか知らんが ＣＩＤからは一定の信用を得ているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
……だが、なぜだか知らんが
ＣＩＤからは一定の信用を得ているようだ。

engChrName: I'd quite like to find out just what about you is worthy of that trust. Assuming there's anything at all.
engSearchText:
I'd quite like to find out just what about you
is worthy of that trust. Assuming there's anything
at all.
jpnChrName: それほどの“何か”を持ってるってんなら、 是非警察にも見せてもらいたいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
それほどの“何か”を持ってるってんなら、
是非警察にも見せてもらいたいものだな。

engChrName: Can we go in, then?
engSearchText: Can we go in, then?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ──！
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ──！

engChrName: Yes, but if you so much as twitch in a suspicious way, I'll have cuffs on you before you even notice. Let us know if you find anything.
engSearchText:
Yes, but if you so much as twitch in a suspicious way,
I'll have cuffs on you before you even notice. Let us
know if you find anything.
jpnChrName: 不審な動きをしたら即逮捕だ。 何か発見次第、すぐに報告しろよ。
jpnSearchText:
不審な動きをしたら即逮捕だ。
何か発見次第、すぐに報告しろよ。

engChrName: Thank you so much, Inspector!
engSearchText: Thank you so much, Inspector!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、警部！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます、警部！

engChrName: Okay. 'Scuse us, then.
engSearchText: Okay. 'Scuse us, then.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、邪魔するぜ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、邪魔するぜ。

engChrName: It's a flyer for the taco stand.
engSearchText: It's a flyer for the taco stand.
jpnChrName: タコス屋の張り紙か……
jpnSearchText: タコス屋の張り紙か……

engChrName: Come to think of it, we met Giacomo right in front of that taco stand.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, we met Giacomo right in front
of that taco stand.
jpnChrName: そういえば以前ジャコモさんと 会ったのもタコス屋さんでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば以前ジャコモさんと
会ったのもタコス屋さんでしたね。

engChrName: You mentioned he was a regular there, usually on Wednesdays.
engSearchText:
You mentioned he was a regular there, usually
on Wednesdays.
jpnChrName: 水曜の昼にはこのお店に行く事が 多かったんでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
水曜の昼にはこのお店に行く事が
多かったんでしたっけ。

engChrName: Tacos... Mmm, I could go for a taco right now!
engSearchText: Tacos... Mmm, I could go for a taco right now!
jpnChrName: タコスですか……話をしていたら 食べたくなってきちゃいました！
jpnSearchText:
タコスですか……話をしていたら
食べたくなってきちゃいました！

engChrName: I wonder what I should get. Their menu's on the back of the flyer, yeah?
engSearchText:
I wonder what I should get. Their menu's on the back
of the flyer, yeah?
jpnChrName: どんなメニューがあるんでしたっけ。 裏面に載ってるでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
どんなメニューがあるんでしたっけ。
裏面に載ってるでしょうか……？

engChrName: Feri tugged on the taco stand flyer.
engSearchText: Feri tugged on the taco stand flyer.
jpnChrName: フェリはタコス屋のチラシを めくってみた。
jpnSearchText:
フェリはタコス屋のチラシを
めくってみた。

engChrName: I-I can't get it off! It's stuck to the wall and all I can lift is this corner!
engSearchText:
I-I can't get it off! It's stuck to the wall and all I can
lift is this corner!

この『Ｎｏ/』という文字はもしかして……

connected. That's a good start.

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

ったく、心配しなくても
アンタに見せるつもりだったさ。

code on here.

engSearchText:
Hmm... I do see that something's written, but are you
sure it's a code?

engSearchText:

is to stick with her, I guess.)

engSearchText: Aww, they're not here.

engChrName: Let's keep going!
engSearchText: Let's keep going!

jpnSearchText: もっと奥に行ってみよっか！

few questions.)

jpnSearchText:
（ずいぶん奥まで来ちまったな……
そろそろ話を切り出してみるか。）

engSearchText: Are you sure we're going the right way?

jpnSearchText:
つうかお前、
ここまで迷いなく歩いて来てるよな。

engSearchText:
You're pretty chill, even with all the monsters around.
Have you been here before?

jpnSearchText:
魔獣もうろついてるってのに、

engSearchText:
Umm... I dunno! I'm not sure where they are, but
I'm just letting my feet guide me!

jpnSearchText:
えっ？　えーと……
分からないけど、なんとなく歩いてるんだよ！

Maybe they're really far in! There was a lot of water
last time...

あの時はゾースイしてたから
奥まで流されちゃったんじゃないかなって。

Because we haven't had a downpour bad enough to
flood the river in months.

me to the end of the tunnel. Why?

I'm right!

the hair ties away!

get them back!

scared about!

Found
.

'Cause they look like they had a lot of effort put
into them.

into it.

down here?

で？　どうしてその妹の髪飾りが

家族みんなでお出かけの日だったの。

each other for fun.

手作りの髪飾りをお互いに
こうかんして遊んでたんだ。

sad this whole time.

だからどうしても
返してあげたかったんだぁ。

your sister from the start.

on you!

それじゃあ、後は頼んだからね！

still dumps more work on my lap.

pass on peacefully to Aidios' side.

her own, the investigation proceeded smoothly.

予めレンが目星をつけていたこともあり
調査は順調に進み……

engChrName: Soon they found out what group—and who—was behind everything.
engSearchText:
Soon they found out what group—and who—was
behind everything.

jpnSearchText:
やがて“とある人物”と“組織”が
絡んでいることを突き止めていった。

engChrName: Okay, now that the plan is settled, all that's left is to take action during their school trip.
engSearchText:
Okay, now that the plan is settled, all that's left is to
take action during their school trip.
jpnChrName: 下調べは十分だな、 フン、後は“視察研修”で実行するだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
下調べは十分だな、
フン、後は“視察研修”で実行するだけだ。

engChrName: Remember that we are only helping you because our boss trusts your plan to work. This better go off without a hitch.
engSearchText:
Remember that we are only helping you because our
boss trusts your plan to work. This better go off
without a hitch.
jpnChrName: 頭に言われたからアンタに人手を貸したが、 本当に上手く行くんだな？
jpnSearchText:
頭に言われたからアンタに人手を貸したが、
本当に上手く行くんだな？

engChrName: Of course it will.
engSearchText: Of course it will.
jpnChrName: 当然だ。
jpnSearchText: 当然だ。

engChrName: Just follow the plan, and soon we'll be rolling in ransom dough!
engSearchText:
Just follow the plan, and soon we'll be rolling in
ransom dough!
jpnChrName: 僕の計画通りに進めれば、 身代金がたんまりいただける！
jpnSearchText:
僕の計画通りに進めれば、
身代金がたんまりいただける！

engChrName: Am I not a part of the Dolor Family? It's my responsibility to see things through.
engSearchText:
Am I not a part of the Dolor Family? It's my
responsibility to see things through.
jpnChrName: 今や僕も《ドゥールファミリー》の一員だからな、 このくらいの貢献はするさ。
jpnSearchText:
今や僕も《ドゥールファミリー》の一員だからな、
このくらいの貢献はするさ。

engChrName: Heh heh, and that's not all.
engSearchText: Heh heh, and that's not all.
jpnChrName: そして、ククク……
jpnSearchText: そして、ククク……

engChrName: If students continue getting kidnapped, the Student Council president will have to involve herself soon enough.
engSearchText:
If students continue getting kidnapped, the Student
Council president will have to involve herself
soon enough.
jpnChrName: 生徒が次々と誘拐なんてされれば 生徒会長の管理責任が問われるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
生徒が次々と誘拐なんてされれば
生徒会長の管理責任が問われるはずだ。

engChrName: The situation will soon demolish her reputation, and as she lay in shambles, we can lure her in with the kidnapped students!
engSearchText:
The situation will soon demolish her reputation, and
as she lay in shambles, we can lure her in with the
kidnapped students!
jpnChrName: そうして地位も名誉も失ったタイミングで 誘拐した生徒を餌にヤツを誘き出して、一気に──
jpnSearchText:
そうして地位も名誉も失ったタイミングで
誘拐した生徒を餌にヤツを誘き出して、一気に──

engChrName: Ahahahaha! I will finally be able to exact revenge on that accursed Renne Bright!
engSearchText:
Ahahahaha! I will finally be able to exact revenge on
that accursed Renne Bright!
jpnChrName: クハハハハハハハッ！　忌々しいレン・ブライトめ！ 今こそ僕の復讐を果たさせてもらうぞ！
jpnSearchText:
クハハハハハハハッ！　忌々しいレン・ブライトめ！
今こそ僕の復讐を果たさせてもらうぞ！

engChrName: I'm certain my father will be most pleased when he hears about this!
engSearchText:
I'm certain my father will be most pleased when he
hears about this!
jpnChrName: あぁ、パパもきっと喜んでくれるに違いない！
jpnSearchText: あぁ、パパもきっと喜んでくれるに違いない！

engChrName: My, Ronald. You're a devoted man, aren't you? I'm most amazed you still remember me, after all this time.
engSearchText:
My, Ronald. You're a devoted man, aren't you?
I'm most amazed you still remember me, after all
this time.
jpnChrName: あら、意外と一途なのね、ロナール君。 まだ私のことが忘れられないなんて。
jpnSearchText:
あら、意外と一途なのね、ロナール君。
まだ私のことが忘れられないなんて。

engChrName: I ain't so sure that a daddy's boy like him is the kinda fan club you'd wanna have after you.
engSearchText:
I ain't so sure that a daddy's boy like him is the kinda
fan club you'd wanna have after you.
jpnChrName: それよりあのファザコンぶりに ちょっと引いたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
それよりあのファザコンぶりに
ちょっと引いたんだが……

engChrName: Wh-What in the world are YOU doing here?!
engSearchText: Wh-What in the world are YOU doing here?!
jpnChrName: なッ、なんで、貴様が……！！
jpnSearchText: なッ、なんで、貴様が……！！

engChrName: I had my suspicions that you would be the one pulling the strings here, Ronald Griffith.
engSearchText:
I had my suspicions that you would be the one pulling
the strings here, Ronald Griffith.
jpnChrName: やはり貴方が背後で糸を引いていたのね、 ロナール・グリフィス君？
jpnSearchText:
やはり貴方が背後で糸を引いていたのね、
ロナール・グリフィス君？

engChrName: Oh, huh. That jogs my memory a little. I've indirectly dealt with this brat before.
engSearchText:
Oh, huh. That jogs my memory a little. I've indirectly
dealt with this brat before.
jpnChrName: なるほど、俺とも間接的に因縁がある人物……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、俺とも間接的に因縁がある人物……

engChrName: This your former classmate, yeah? The one that had a bone to pick with you and ended up gettin' expelled after tryin' to mess with you.
engSearchText:
This your former classmate, yeah? The one that had a
bone to pick with you and ended up gettin' expelled
after tryin' to mess with you.
jpnChrName: 確か以前お前さんにちょっかいを出した挙げ句、 逆に追い詰められて退学になった元同級生だっけか？
jpnSearchText:
確か以前お前さんにちょっかいを出した挙げ句、
逆に追い詰められて退学になった元同級生だっけか？

engChrName: The very same. You were most helpful digging up information on his father at the time, even if it was through our mutual reporter acquaintance.
engSearchText:
The very same. You were most helpful digging up
information on his father at the time, even if it was
through our mutual reporter acquaintance.
jpnChrName: ええ、記者さんを介して裏解決屋さんも 情報収集を手伝ってくれたあの汚職政治家の息子。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、記者さんを介して裏解決屋さんも
情報収集を手伝ってくれたあの汚職政治家の息子。

engChrName: I must extend my thanks again for assisting me then.
engSearchText: I must extend my thanks again for assisting me then.
jpnChrName: とても役に立った情報だったわ。
jpnSearchText: とても役に立った情報だったわ。

engChrName: You two have NO idea what hell you put us through after you ruined my father's career!
engSearchText:
You two have NO idea what hell you put us through
after you ruined my father's career!
jpnChrName: くっ……貴様らのせいでパパが失脚して、 僕たちがどれだけ苦しい目にあったか……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……貴様らのせいでパパが失脚して、
僕たちがどれだけ苦しい目にあったか……！

engChrName: No, I don't. And I couldn't care less, either.
engSearchText: No, I don't. And I couldn't care less, either.
jpnChrName: 知るわけがないでしょう、 特に興味もないし。
jpnSearchText:
知るわけがないでしょう、
特に興味もないし。

engChrName: You two were just askin' for it.
engSearchText: You two were just askin' for it.
jpnChrName: つーか完全に自業自得だろうが。
jpnSearchText: つーか完全に自業自得だろうが。

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: グッ……！
jpnSearchText: グッ……！

engChrName: So let me recapitulate here. Your grand plan was to engineer a series of kidnappings to, as you put it, enact your revenge on me?
engSearchText:
So let me recapitulate here. Your grand plan was to
engineer a series of kidnappings to, as you put it,
enact your revenge on me?
jpnChrName: 要するに、私に報復するための 誘拐計画だったわけね。
jpnSearchText:
要するに、私に報復するための
誘拐計画だったわけね。

engChrName: What a tedious and oblique way of going about things you have.
engSearchText:
What a tedious and oblique way of going about
things you have.
jpnChrName: やり方が回りくどすぎないかしら？
jpnSearchText: やり方が回りくどすぎないかしら？

engChrName: Give him SOME credit. His brain might not be turnin' on right after what you did to him.
engSearchText:
Give him SOME credit. His brain might not be
turnin' on right after what you did to him.
jpnChrName: 大方前回お前さんに懲らしめられたのが トラウマにでもなったんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
大方前回お前さんに懲らしめられたのが
トラウマにでもなったんだろう。

engChrName: Probably scared him shitless of a face to face confrontation.
engSearchText:
Probably scared him shitless of a face to
face confrontation.
jpnChrName: だから直接狙う勇気すらなくなったってわけだ。
jpnSearchText: だから直接狙う勇気すらなくなったってわけだ。

engChrName: You strike a good point there.
engSearchText: You strike a good point there.
jpnChrName: なるほどね。
jpnSearchText: なるほどね。

engChrName: D-Don't make fun of me!
engSearchText: D-Don't make fun of me!
jpnChrName: ババ、バカにするなぁっ……！！
jpnSearchText: ババ、バカにするなぁっ……！！

engChrName: Me joining the Dolor Family was all so I could make you pay!
engSearchText:
Me joining the Dolor Family was all so I could make
you pay!
jpnChrName: 僕は貴様に復讐するために、 《ドゥールファミリー》の一員になったんだ！
jpnSearchText:
僕は貴様に復讐するために、
《ドゥールファミリー》の一員になったんだ！

engChrName: We're a mafia with roots dating back to the very history of the Republic! We are not to be messed with!
engSearchText:
We're a mafia with roots dating back to the very
history of the Republic! We are not to be
messed with!
jpnChrName: 長くこの共和国に根付いた 歴史のある正真正銘の凶悪マフィアだ！
jpnSearchText:
長くこの共和国に根付いた
歴史のある正真正銘の凶悪マフィアだ！

engChrName: So don't you DARE underestimate me!
engSearchText: So don't you DARE underestimate me!
jpnChrName: 前回のようになると思うな！
jpnSearchText: 前回のようになると思うな！

engChrName: Man. There's a name I haven't heard in a while.
engSearchText: Man. There's a name I haven't heard in a while.
jpnChrName: 《ドゥールファミリー》…… その名前を聞くのは久しぶりだな。
jpnSearchText:
《ドゥールファミリー》……
その名前を聞くのは久しぶりだな。

engChrName: I would say the Dolor Family figures in at about the third largest mafia in the Republic.
engSearchText:
I would say the Dolor Family figures in at about the
third largest mafia in the Republic.
jpnChrName: 共和国で三番手にあたる勢力のマフィアね。
jpnSearchText: 共和国で三番手にあたる勢力のマフィアね。

engChrName: They vied for the second spot years ago, just behind Heiyue. Back then they held an immense amount of power.
engSearchText:
They vied for the second spot years ago, just behind
Heiyue. Back then they held an immense amount
of power.
jpnChrName: 以前は黒月に次ぐ二番手で、 かなり勢いがあったみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
以前は黒月に次ぐ二番手で、
かなり勢いがあったみたいだけど……

engChrName: However, Almata's recent moves have managed to displace them from their zone of influence, and they haven't been as active as a result.
engSearchText:
However, Almata's recent moves have managed to
displace them from their zone of influence, and they
haven't been as active as a result.
jpnChrName: ここ数年はアルマータに勢力を奪われ、 活動もすっかり減ってしまったみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
ここ数年はアルマータに勢力を奪われ、
活動もすっかり減ってしまったみたいね？

engChrName: Sh-Shut up! I don't wanna hear Almata's name anywhere in relation to us!
engSearchText:
Sh-Shut up! I don't wanna hear Almata's name
anywhere in relation to us!
jpnChrName: 黙れ小娘！　それとあのクソッタレの アルマータの話をするんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText:
黙れ小娘！　それとあのクソッタレの
アルマータの話をするんじゃねえ！

engChrName: Oh, my. Is Almata yet another sore spot for you? My apologies, that was so inconsiderate of me.
engSearchText:
Oh, my. Is Almata yet another sore spot for you?
My apologies, that was so inconsiderate of me.
jpnChrName: あら、アルマータにコンプレックスがあるのかしら？ ごめんなさいね、気づかなくて。
jpnSearchText:
あら、アルマータにコンプレックスがあるのかしら？
ごめんなさいね、気づかなくて。

engChrName: You bitches are really asking for it now!
engSearchText: You bitches are really asking for it now!
jpnChrName: ガキども……ブッ殺されてぇのか！？
jpnSearchText: ガキども……ブッ殺されてぇのか！？

engChrName: I might have to fast track things now, but you falling straight into my hands must be a blessing from Aidios herself!
engSearchText:
I might have to fast track things now, but you falling
straight into my hands must be a blessing from
Aidios herself!
jpnChrName: 計画がバレたのは予想外だったが、 そっちから来たのは好都合だ！
jpnSearchText:
計画がバレたのは予想外だったが、
そっちから来たのは好都合だ！

engChrName: Thank you for saving me the trouble. To show my gratitude, I'll give you a demonstration of the true darkness this world is capable of!
engSearchText:
Thank you for saving me the trouble. To show my
gratitude, I'll give you a demonstration of the true
darkness this world is capable of!
jpnChrName: 見せてやるよ、正真正銘の 闇の世界の力というものをなぁ！！
jpnSearchText:
見せてやるよ、正真正銘の
闇の世界の力というものをなぁ！！

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...
jpnChrName: クス、クスクス……
jpnSearchText: クス、クスクス……

engChrName: Wh-What's so damn funny?!
engSearchText: Wh-What's so damn funny?!
jpnChrName: な、何がおかしい！？
jpnSearchText: な、何がおかしい！？

engChrName: Pardon me, Ronald. I couldn't quite help myself. Such a cute declaration to make towards me, of all people. You're out of your depth.
engSearchText:
Pardon me, Ronald. I couldn't quite help myself.
Such a cute declaration to make towards me, of
all people. You're out of your depth.
jpnChrName: いえ、ロナール君があまりにも 可愛いことを言うものだから、つい。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、ロナール君があまりにも
可愛いことを言うものだから、つい。

engChrName: Shall we, spriggan?
engSearchText: Shall we, spriggan?
jpnChrName: それじゃ裏解決屋さん、お願いしていいかしら？
jpnSearchText: それじゃ裏解決屋さん、お願いしていいかしら？

engChrName: *sigh* Fine. But I ain't doin' all the work here.
engSearchText: *sigh* Fine. But I ain't doin' all the work here.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……お前さんもサボるんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ……お前さんもサボるんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: You needn't worry. I've a message I need them to hear loud and clear. You don't ever try to harm my students.
engSearchText:
You needn't worry. I've a message I need them to
hear loud and clear. You don't ever try to harm
my students.
jpnChrName: ええ、うちの生徒に手出しができないように、 たっぷり可愛がってあげないと❤
jpnSearchText:
ええ、うちの生徒に手出しができないように、
たっぷり可愛がってあげないと❤

engChrName: Heh, you don't scare me! It won't take me ten minutes with you until every bone in your body is crying in pain!
engSearchText:
Heh, you don't scare me! It won't take me ten
minutes with you until every bone in your body is
crying in pain!
jpnChrName: フン、虚勢を張るのも今のうちだ── その顔も１０分後には絶望に染めてやる！
jpnSearchText:
フン、虚勢を張るのも今のうちだ──
その顔も１０分後には絶望に染めてやる！

engChrName: Y-You've gotta be shitting me! We're... We're real mafia!
engSearchText:
Y-You've gotta be shitting me! We're... We're
real mafia!
jpnChrName: う、うそだ………本物の、マフィアだぞ？
jpnSearchText: う、うそだ………本物の、マフィアだぞ？

engChrName: Those gangsters from last year were NOTHING compared to us! So...HOW?! We didn't even get a scratch in!
engSearchText:
Those gangsters from last year were NOTHING
compared to us! So...HOW?! We didn't even get a
scratch in!
jpnChrName: １年前に雇った半グレどもとは違う…… そ、それがこんなあっさり……
jpnSearchText:
１年前に雇った半グレどもとは違う……
そ、それがこんなあっさり……

engChrName: You were right about one thing. It did, indeed, take less than ten minutes.
engSearchText:
You were right about one thing. It did, indeed, take
less than ten minutes.
jpnChrName: １０分もいらなかったわね？
jpnSearchText: １０分もいらなかったわね？

engChrName: N-Now that I think about it, I remember one of our grunts talking about getting their shit kicked in by a student before!
engSearchText:
N-Now that I think about it, I remember one of our
grunts talking about getting their shit kicked in by a
student before!

jpnSearchText:
お、思い出したぞ……
前にどこぞの下っ端が学生にボコられたとかいう……！

engChrName: Shit! I think this is that Arkride dude that's been making waves all over!
engSearchText:
Shit! I think this is that Arkride dude that's been
making waves all over!

jpnSearchText:
それに隣の男は、確か最近色々と出しゃばってる
アークライドなんとか……

engChrName: Wait, the one that's been messin' with Almata?! What the hell is he doin' here?!
engSearchText:
Wait, the one that's been messin' with Almata?!
What the hell is he doin' here?!
jpnChrName: ア、アルマータとやりあったっつう噂の！？ なんでそんな奴らがここにいる！？
jpnSearchText:
ア、アルマータとやりあったっつう噂の！？
なんでそんな奴らがここにいる！？

engChrName: This ain't no joke! We got no chance against him!
engSearchText: This ain't no joke! We got no chance against him!
jpnChrName: 冗談じゃねえ、俺たちだけで敵う相手じゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: 冗談じゃねえ、俺たちだけで敵う相手じゃねえ！

engChrName: R-Run, everyone!
engSearchText: R-Run, everyone!
jpnChrName: て、撤退するぞ──！！
jpnSearchText: て、撤退するぞ──！！

engChrName: Gonna guess they were pretty low on the family's pecking order, but I still expected them to put up a better fight.
engSearchText:
Gonna guess they were pretty low on the family's
pecking order, but I still expected them to put up a
better fight.
jpnChrName: 《ドゥールファミリー》の中でも 下っ端みたいだし、こんなもんか。
jpnSearchText:
《ドゥールファミリー》の中でも
下っ端みたいだし、こんなもんか。

engChrName: W-Wait, please!
engSearchText: W-Wait, please!
jpnChrName: ま、待て、お前たち……
jpnSearchText: ま、待て、お前たち……

engChrName: What was it, Ronald, that you said before?
engSearchText: What was it, Ronald, that you said before?
jpnChrName: それでロナール君、なんて言ってたかしら？
jpnSearchText: それでロナール君、なんて言ってたかしら？

engChrName: Oh, I know! Something about demonstrating the true darkness this world is capable of!
engSearchText:
Oh, I know! Something about demonstrating the true
darkness this world is capable of!

engChrName: The sheer audacity to even dare utter that. You, who's never had the courage to truly gaze at the abyss and have it stare back at you.

abyss and have it stare back at you.

よくもそんなことを口にできるわね。

that darkness.

this time.

あら、あの時と同じ結果ね。
根性があるのかないのか……

engChrName: At least we managed to clean up last time's leftovers, so things should be spick and span from here on.

At least we managed to clean up last time's leftovers,
so things should be spick and span from here on.

まあ、ある意味あの時のやり残しだ。
面倒事が片付いて何よりだぜ。

engChrName: That we have. I must thank you again for your help. That's one more time to add to the tally.

jpnChrName: ありがとう、裏解決屋さん。 また助けられちゃったわね。

be honest.

ま、お前さん一人でも
解決できたと思うがな。

engChrName: You've come a long way from the Kitty I first met. Good work today, Renne.

You've come a long way from the Kitty I first met.
Good work today, Renne.
jpnChrName: お疲れだ、仔猫──いや、レン。
jpnSearchText: お疲れだ、仔猫──いや、レン。

engChrName: Heehee. Likewise.
engSearchText: Heehee. Likewise.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……お疲れ様。

engChrName: Having completed their objective, Van accompanied Renne back to the surface for his promised gelato.
engSearchText:

jpnChrName: その後、レンと地上に戻って 報酬のジェラートを受け取り……

その後、レンと地上に戻って
報酬のジェラートを受け取り……

engChrName: The two took a short break together, Van enjoying his reward alongside a black tea of Renne's recommendation before parting ways.

engChrName: Okay. If you're ready, then let's get to it.
engSearchText: Okay. If you're ready, then let's get to it.
jpnChrName: よし、さっそく仕掛けんぞ。
jpnSearchText: よし、さっそく仕掛けんぞ。

engChrName: Just to make sure, you know what shards are?
engSearchText: Just to make sure, you know what shards are?
jpnChrName: ちなみに“シャード”は知ってるか？
jpnSearchText: ちなみに“シャード”は知ってるか？

engChrName: Yes, I do. They're a field deployed by Xiphas.
engSearchText: Yes, I do. They're a field deployed by Xiphas.
jpnChrName: 霊子装片（シャード）── ザイファが展開できる特殊な力場ですね。
jpnSearchText:
霊子装片（シャード）──
ザイファが展開できる特殊な力場ですね。

engChrName: I've used them before, but only in mock battles, and even then it was just for defensive purposes.
engSearchText:
I've used them before, but only in mock battles, and
even then it was just for defensive purposes.
jpnChrName: 模擬戦で使用したことはありますが…… 防御用のシールドとして利用したくらいです。
jpnSearchText:
模擬戦で使用したことはありますが……
防御用のシールドとして利用したくらいです。

engChrName: That's a fine start.
engSearchText: That's a fine start.
jpnChrName: ま、そんなもんか。
jpnSearchText: ま、そんなもんか。

engChrName: Shards can be used for more than just that. They can be linked and used offensively, among other things.
engSearchText:
Shards can be used for more than just that. They can
be linked and used offensively, among other things.

jpnSearchText:
シャードは使いこなすと、
攻撃や連携にも応用できんだが……

engChrName: When you do, stay on your toes, 'cause it's fightin' time.

engChrName: As I'll ever be!

engChrName: Let's do this.

engChrName: Deploying shards!

engChrName: That'll do.

jpnChrName: まずはこんなもんか。

engChrName: You handled yourself pretty well for your first fight.

悪くない動きだったぜ。

You flatter me, but I only did so well because you
were covering me.

ずいぶん珍しい支援ＡＩ（ホロウ）をお使いですね。

engChrName: I'm using a custom, personalized holo.

俺が使ってんのは一品物で

engChrName: It's pretty special, I'd say.

jpnChrName: その時点で特殊っちゃあ特殊だな。
jpnSearchText: その時点で特殊っちゃあ特殊だな。

engChrName: Her model is MK-ESV004. Name's Mare.
engSearchText: Her model is MK-ESV004. Name's Mare.
jpnChrName: 型式MK-ESV004──《メア》。
jpnSearchText: 型式MK-ESV004──《メア》。

engChrName: I got an...acquaintance to send me a test version.
engSearchText: I got an...acquaintance to send me a test version.
jpnChrName: とある筋から送られてきた 実験段階のモンをテストで使ってる。

とある筋から送られてきた
実験段階のモンをテストで使ってる。

Her performance is way better than the
generic models. It's the only reason I put up with her
big mouth.
jpnChrName: 汎用型のＡＩよりも高性能なんだが、 その分やかましいのはご愛敬だな。

jpnChrName: そんな、やかましいだなんて 思ってませんから。

engChrName: The Xipha in general are really convenient to have.

……とまあ、そいつはともかく。

jelly-like bodies.

武器による攻撃が通りにくそうですね。

engChrName: Nah, don't mind me.

engChrName: Your orbal staff's pretty convenient when dealing with these guys.

Your orbal staff's pretty convenient when dealing
with these guys.

今みたいな奴らが相手なら、

It's nice havin' you watch my six.

改めてサポートは任せたぜ。
